description: This file defines a REST controller for managing notes. It provides CRUD endpoints for creating, listing, retrieving, updating, and deleting notes, using Spring Boot annotations and Swagger documentation.

classes.name: NoteController
classes.description: Controller class that defines REST API endpoints for CRUD operations on notes.

methods.name: create
methods.description: Handles POST requests to create a new note. Validates request and returns created note with location header.

methods.name: list
methods.description: Handles GET requests to list all notes.

methods.name: get
methods.description: Handles GET requests to retrieve a single note by its ID.

methods.name: update
methods.description: Handles PUT requests to update an existing note identified by ID.

methods.name: delete
methods.description: Handles DELETE requests to remove a note by its ID.

methods.name: handleValidation
methods.description: Handles validation errors for request payloads, returns a structured error response.
